mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BG_SYS_PRIV_USER_R_ROLE (USER_ID, ROLE_ID) SELECT (SELECT U.USERID FROM BG_SYS_USER U WHERE U.HRCODE = #{empCode} AND U.STATE = 0), (SELECT R.ID FROM BG_SYS_ROLE R WHERE R.ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode} AND R.VALID = 1) FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT A.ROLE_ID FROM BG_SYS_PRIV_USER_R_ROLE A JOIN BG_SYS_ROLE B ON A.ROLE_ID = B.ID AND B.VALID = 1 JOIN BG_SYS_USER C ON A.USER_ID = C.USERID AND C.STATE = 0 WHERE A.VALID = 1 AND C.HRCODE = #{empCode} AND B.ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode})

INSERT INTO BG_SYS_PRIV_USER_R_ORGAN (USER_ID, ORGAN_ID) SELECT (SELECT U.USERID FROM BG_SYS_USER U WHERE U.HRCODE = #{empCode} AND U.STATE = 0), (SELECT D.DEPTID FROM BG_SYS_DEPT D WHERE D.DEPTCODE = #{deptCode} AND D.VALID = 1) FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT A.ORGAN_ID FROM BG_SYS_PRIV_USER_R_ORGAN A JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT B ON A.ORGAN_ID = B.DEPTID AND A.VALID = 1 JOIN BG_SYS_USER C ON A.USER_ID = C.USERID AND C.STATE = 0 WHERE A.VALID = 1 AND C.HRCODE = #{empCode} AND B.DEPTCODE = #{deptCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE BG_SYS_PRIV_USER_R_ORGAN O SET O.VALID = 0 WHERE O.ORGAN_ID = (SELECT DEPTID FROM BG_SYS_DEPT WHERE DEPTCODE = #{deptCode}) AND O.USER_ID = (SELECT USERID FROM BG_SYS_USER WHERE HRCODE = #{hrCode}) AND O.VALID = 1

UPDATE BG_SYS_PRIV_USER_R_ROLE E SET E.VALID = 0 WHERE E.VALID = 1 AND E.USER_ID = (SELECT USERID FROM BG_SYS_USER WHERE HRCODE = #{hrCode}) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM BG_SYS_PRIV_USER_R_ORGAN O JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON O.ORGAN_ID = D.DEPTID JOIN BG_SYS_USER U ON O.USER_ID = U.USERID WHERE O.VALID = 1 AND U.HRCODE = #{hrCode} AND D.TYPE = DECODE((SELECT ROLE_CODE FROM BG_SYS_ROLE WHERE ID = E.ROLE_ID), 'MANAGER_UNIT', 0, 'MANAGER_KJB', 0, 'MANAGER_DEPT', 1, 'MANAGER_LAB', 2))
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BG_SYS_DEPT WHERE VALID = 1 AND DEPTCODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
